attributes.action: Legislate to ensure that offenders who are injured during the commission of a crime or act of anti social behaviour are unable to sue their victims or apprehending person for damages for any injuries incurred.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation whereby offenders can pursue a victim (or an apprehending person) for monetary redress should they be injured when committing a crime or behaving in an anti social manner cannot be allowed to continue. A law abiding person should not have to be ounished for being forced to defend themselves, their family nor their property. A rule of "contributory negligence" should be applied. If an offender chooses to commit an offence and is then injured during the commission of it, it should be upon their own head. If a victim defends themselves/their property against agression or vandalisom, they should be able to do so without the fear of the miscreant seeking damages.
